verses.roman:
sādhana-siddha--dāsa, sakhā, guru, kānta-gaṇa
jāta-rati sādhaka-bhakta--cāri-vidha jana

synonyms: sādhana-siddha—those who have perfected themselves by devotional service; dāsa—servants; sakhā—friends; guru—superiors; kāntā-gaṇa—beloved damsels; jāta-rati sādhaka-bhakta—devotees who have become mature by devotional service; cāri-vidha jana—they are also of four varieties.
translation: "Among those who have perfected themselves by devotional service, there are servants, friends, superiors and beloved damsels. Similarly, there are four types of mature devotees.
